There could also be some additional small touches to her ability effects.

**Sunlight (Passive):** The effect for this could be similar to {{champion:51}}  ult target indicator but smaller and more centered on the upper torso of the enemy champion.

**Shield of Daybreak (Q):** perhaps a shield bash powered by rockets along with lasery glow.

**Eclipse (W):** The shield presented in the artwork would be fine...I don't have any other ideas immediately.

**Zenith Blade (E):** Adds a "Target Locked" text by the passive indicator and then proceeds to jetpack to the target.

**Solar Flare (R):** Projects a targeting laser from her sword and the targeting circle on the ground is an actual targeting circle. (Maybe like http://www.sc2blog.com/uploaded/nukes.jpg)
